name: 2025 13th International Conference on Nano and Materials Science
content: Publication: The accepted and presented papers will be published in the journals of Scientific.Net collection. which will be indexed by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. 1.SSP(Solid State Phenomena) 2.MSF(Materials Science Forum) 3.KEM(Key Engineering Materials) 4.DDF(Defect and Diffusion Forum)
